General.Name: Life Insurance Corporation Of India
General.Description: Life Insurance Corporation of India provides life insurance products in India, Fiji, Mauritius, and the United Kingdom. It provides insurance, pension, unit linked, micro insurance, withdraw, and health plans; and riders, as well as various group schemes. Life Insurance Corporation of India was incorporated in 1956 and is based in Mumbai, India.
